channel.title: Contacts on Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on Laboratory

item.title: SOP Submissions
item.description:
<form class="contact-form" action="https://formsubmit.co/my@email.here" method="POST">
<input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false"> <input type="hidden" name="_template" value="table"> <input type="hidden" name="_next" value="https://spikemurphy.github.io/Laboratory/contact/thanks_for_submission">
<label for="topic">Current position</label> <select id="topic" name="topic" required> <option value="" disabled selected>Select your current position</option> <option value="other">Technical Assistant</option> <option value="general_request">B. Sc. Student</option> <option value="general_request">Bachelor of Science</option> <option value="general_request">M. Sc. Student</option> <option value="general_request">Master of Science</option> <option value="collaboration">Doctoral Candidate</option> <option value="data_request">Postdoctoral Researcher</option> <option value="data_request">Working Group Leader</option> <option value="data_request">Professor</option> <option value="data_request">Head of Institute</option> <option value="data_request">Head of Center</option> </select>
<label for="name">Name</label> <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>
<label for="surname">Surname</label> <input type="text" id="surname" name="surname" required>
<label for="institution">Institution</label> <input type="text" id="institution" name="institution" required>
<label for="country">Country</label> <input type="text" id="country" name="country" >
<label for="email">Email</label> <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
<label for="topic">Topic</label> <select id="topic" name="topic" required> <option value="" disabled selected>Select your topic</option> <option value="general_request">Chemical Recipe</option> <option value="collaboration">Buffer Recipe</option> <option value="data_request">Methode</option> <option value="data_request">Workflow</option> <option value="other">Other</option> </select>
<label for="file">Attach File (optional)</label> <input type="file" id="file" name="attachment">
<label for="message">Message and additional information</label> <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="5" required></textarea>
<button type="submit">Send Message</button>
<label> <input type="checkbox" name="agree_terms" required> I agree to the Terms of Use. </label>
</form>
